title: (x) "Contact us" display script - Habano {Tamye}
content:
I’ve been searching for a nice display script and I just came across this, but I can’t ID it. Any IDeas?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [contact us.jpeg](http://web.archive.org/web/20071106161629/http:/typophile.com/files/contact%20us.jpeg) | 31.07 KB |

 [‹ Alternatives for Fairfield and Parisine for a student project](http://web.archive.org/web/20071106161629/http:/typophile.com/node/38236 "Go to previous forum topic") [Looking for a free alternative for Trinité No. 2 ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071106161629/http:/typophile.com/node/38225 "Go to next forum topic")
author: cooper design

comments.content:
Habano, from Alejandro Paul and Angel Kozuipa - see Sudtipos and Veer.

[http://www.sudtipos.com/fonts/24](http://web.archive.org/web/20071106161629/http:/www.sudtipos.com/fonts/24 "http://www.sudtipos.com/fonts/24")  
 [http://www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=UMT0000014](http://web.archive.org/web/20071106161629/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=UMT0000014 "http://www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=UMT0000014")
Just so. It looks great. Thank you very much, Tanye.
